warscrolls.name: Aggradon Lancers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Musician (1/3), Standard Bearer (1/3), Order, Seraphon, Saurus

melee.name: Aggradon’s Rending Bites and Striking Talons

abilities.name: Primal Rage
abilities.effect:
This unit must use this ability each turn.

If this unit used any **FIGHT** abilities this turn, place a **rage token** next to it, to a maximum of 3. If this unit did not use any **FIGHT** abilities this turn, remove all **rage tokens** it has.

Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s **Companion** weapons for each **rage token** it has until the end of the next turn.

warscrolls.name: Bastiladon with Ark of Sotek
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Order, Seraphon, Skink

abilities.name: Ark of Sotek
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 different enemy units within 9" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Bastiladon with Solar Engine
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Order, Seraphon, Skink

abilities.name: Tail Swipe
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in the target unit, to a maximum of 8. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

warscrolls.name: Engine of the Gods
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Order, Seraphon, Skink

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Stegadon's Horns and Jaws** is 4.

abilities.name: Crest of Horns
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that charged this turn and is in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a D3. On a 2+:

• Inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.
• Add 1 to save rolls for attacks made by that enemy unit that target this unit for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Cosmic Engine
abilities.declare: Pick if this unit will harness or reserve the power of its cosmic engine.
abilities.effect:
If it will reserve the power, place a **cosmic power token** next to this unit.

If it will harness the power, roll a dice and add the number of **cosmic power tokens** this unit has to the roll. Then, remove all **cosmic power tokens** this unit has and pick 1 of the following effects (if possible).

***Healing Light:*** On a 3+, you can **Heal (D3)** all friendly **SERAPHON** units wholly within 12" of this unit.

***Starlight Summons:*** On a 5+, you can pick up to 3 friendly **SERAPHON** units wholly within 12" of this unit. Return 1 slain model to each unit.

***Time Slows:*** On a 6+, you can pick up to 3 friendly **SERAPHON** units wholly within 12" of this unit. Those units have **STRIKE-FIRST** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Hunters of Huanchi with Dartpipes
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion (1/5), Musician (1/5), Ward (5+), Order, Seraphon, Skink

abilities.name: Chameleon Ambush
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is **in ambush**.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Star-venom
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that had any damage points allocated to it this turn by attacks made with this unit’s **Dartpipe** to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, subtract 1 from wound rolls for the target’s combat attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Hidden Hunters
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it has not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit in reserve **in ambush**. It has now been deployed.

warscrolls.name: Hunters of Huanchi with Starstone Bolas
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion (1/5), Musician (1/5), Ward (5+), Order, Seraphon, Skink

abilities.name: Starstone Bolas
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that was targeted by this unit’s **Starstone Bolas** this turn to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for the target, to a minimum of 1.

abilities.name: Chameleon Ambush
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is **in ambush**.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Hidden Hunters
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it has not been deployed.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit in reserve **in ambush**. It has now been deployed.

warscrolls.name: Kroxigor
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Order, Seraphon, Kroxigor

abilities.name: Brutal Blows
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons for attacks that target an enemy unit that has 10 or more models.

warscrolls.name: Kroxigor Warspawned
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Order, Seraphon, Kroxigor

abilities.name: Heavy-scaled Skin
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of ranged weapons used for shooting attacks that target this unit.

abilities.name: Spawn of Sotek
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons while this unit is wholly within 12" of any friendly **SKINK INFANTRY** or **SKINK CAVALRY** units in combat.

warscrolls.name: Lord Kroak
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Wizard (3), Fly, Ward (4+), Order, Seraphon, Slann

abilities.name: Celestial Deliverance
abilities.declare: This unit can cast this spell more than once per phase. Pick up to 3 different visible enemy units within 18" of this unit to be the targets, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on each target.

abilities.name: Arcane Vassal
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Any Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SKINK WIZARD** wholly within 18" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Measure the range and visibility of the next **SPELL** ability used by this unit this phase from the target instead of from this unit.

The target is treated as the caster for the purpose of other abilities or spell effects, such as ‘Unbind’ or ‘The Earth Trembles’.

abilities.name: Supreme Master of Order
abilities.effect: Add 2 to casting rolls, and add 1 to unbinding rolls and banishment rolls for this unit. In addition, this unit can use an **UNBIND** ability if an enemy **WIZARD** anywhere on the battlefield uses a **SPELL** ability instead of an enemy **WIZARD** within 30" of this unit, and when using the ‘Banish Manifestation’ ability, this unit can pick a manifestation anywhere on the battlefield instead of within 30" of it.

abilities.name: Dead for Innumerable Ages
abilities.effect: This unit must use this ability each turn while it is damaged. Roll 3D6 and add the number of damage points this unit has to the roll. On a 20+, this unit is destroyed. Otherwise, **Heal (18)** this unit.

warscrolls.name: Raptadon Chargers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Musician (1/5), Standard Bearer (1/5), Order, Seraphon, Skink

abilities.name: Cold-blooded Unity
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for this unit’s combat attacks if they target an enemy unit that was targeted by shooting attacks made by a friendly **Raptadon** **Hunters** unit in the same turn.

warscrolls.name: Raptadon Hunters
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Musician (1/5), Standard Bearer (1/5), Order, Seraphon, Skink

abilities.name: Deadly Cohesion
abilities.declare: If this unit is not in combat, pick a friendly **Raptadon Chargers** unit that charged this turn and is within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: This unit can use a **SHOOT** ability as if it were your shooting phase. It must target a visible enemy unit in combat with the target.

warscrolls.name: Realmshaper Engine
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Faction Terrain, Order, Seraphon

abilities.name: Power Unleashed
abilities.declare: If there are any friendly **SERAPHON WIZARDS** within 3" of this terrain feature, pick another terrain feature within 24" of this terrain feature, then pick up to 3 enemy units within 3" of that terrain feature to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. If that terrain feature has a Health characteristic, inflict D3 mortal damage on it.

abilities.name: Fierce Guardians
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **SAURUS** or **KROXIGOR** units that target an enemy unit while that enemy unit is within 9" of this terrain feature.

warscrolls.name: Ripperdactyl Chief
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Cavalry, Fly, Order, Seraphon, Skink

abilities.name: Ripperdactyl Assault
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of **Moonstone Warspears** used by friendly **Ripperdactyl Riders** units wholly within 12" of this unit for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Toad Rage
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s **Ripperdactyl’s Tearing Jaws** while it is in combat with any units that have a **Blot Toad**.

abilities.name: Blot Toad
abilities.declare: You receive 1 **Blot Toad** token for each **Ripperdactyl Chief** or **Ripperdactyl Riders** unit in your army, to a maximum of 3 tokens. Pick a number of enemy units equal to the number of **Blot Toads** you have to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Place a **Blot Toad** next to each target.

warscrolls.name: Ripperdactyl Riders
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Fly, Order, Seraphon, Skink

abilities.name: Toad Rage
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s **Ripperdactyl’s Tearing Jaws** while it is in combat with any units that have a **Blot Toad**.

abilities.name: Blot Toad
abilities.declare: You receive 1 **Blot Toad** token for each **Ripperdactyl Chief** or **Ripperdactyl Riders** unit in your army, to a maximum of 3 tokens. Pick a number of enemy units equal to the number of **Blot Toads** you have to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Place a **Blot Toad** next to each target.

abilities.name: Dispersed Formation
abilities.effect: This unit has a coherency range of 2".

warscrolls.name: Ripperdactyl Riders (2 models)
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Fly, Order, Seraphon, Skink

abilities.name: Toad Rage
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s **Ripperdactyl’s Tearing Jaws** while it is in combat with any units that have a **Blot Toad**.

abilities.name: Blot Toad
abilities.declare: You receive 1 **Blot Toad** token for each **Ripperdactyl Chief** or **Ripperdactyl Riders** unit in your army, to a maximum of 3 tokens. Pick a number of enemy units equal to the number of **Blot Toads** you have to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Place a **Blot Toad** next to each target.

abilities.name: Dispersed Formation
abilities.effect: This unit has a coherency range of 2".

warscrolls.name: Saurus Astrolith Bearer
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Order, Seraphon, Saurus

abilities.name: Celestial Conduit
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a SPELL ability for a friendly SERAPHON WIZARD wholly within 12" of this unit
abilities.effect: If that spell is successfully cast, for the rest of the turn, add 3 to the control scores of friendly **SERAPHON** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Revivifying Energies
abilities.effect: Friendly **SERAPHON INFANTRY** units have **WARD (6+)** while they are wholly within 12" of this unit. If a unit already has **WARD (6+)**, it has **WARD (5+)** instead.

warscrolls.name: Saurus Guard
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/5), Standard Bearer (1/5), Order, Seraphon, Saurus

abilities.name: Selfless Protectors
abilities.effect: While any friendly **SLANN** units are within this unit’s combat range, both this unit and those **SLANN** units have **WARD (5+)**.

warscrolls.name: Saurus Oldblood
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Order, Seraphon, Saurus

abilities.name: Wrath of the Seraphon
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **SAURUS INFANTRY** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Predatory Exemplar
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-**HERO SAURUS INFANTRY** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Saurus Oldblood on Carnosaur
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Order, Seraphon, Saurus

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Carnosaur’s Massive Jaws** is 2.

abilities.name: Terror
abilities.effect: Subtract 2 from the control scores of enemy units while they are in combat with this unit.

abilities.name: Spearhead of the Charge
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, add 1 to charge rolls for friendly **SAURUS** units while they are wholly within 18" of this unit for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Blood Frenzy
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.effect: If this unit is in combat with any damaged enemy **MONSTERS**, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit has **STRIKE-FIRST** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Saurus Scar-Veteran on Aggradon
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Cavalry, Order, Seraphon, Saurus

melee.name: Aggradon’s Rending Bites and Striking Talons

abilities.name: Alpha Roar
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick this unit and each friendly **Aggradon Lancers** unit wholly within 12" of it to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the targets’ **Companion** weapons for the rest of the turn. In addition, place a **rage token** next to each target, to a maximum of 3 per unit.

abilities.name: Primal Rage
abilities.effect:
This unit must use this ability each turn.

If this unit used any **FIGHT** abilities this turn, place a **rage token** next to it, to a maximum of 3. If this unit did not use any **FIGHT** abilities this turn, remove all **rage tokens** it has.

Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s **Companion** weapons for each **rage token** it has until the end of the next turn.

warscrolls.name: Saurus Scar-Veteran on Carnosaur
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Order, Seraphon, Saurus

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Carnosaur’s Massive Jaws** is 2.

abilities.name: Terror
abilities.effect: Subtract 2 from the control scores of enemy units while they are in combat with this unit.

abilities.name: Maim and Tear
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **HERO** in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the number of damage points the target has. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

warscrolls.name: Saurus Warriors
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Order, Seraphon, Saurus

abilities.name: Ordered Cohorts
abilities.effect: Add 1 to save rolls for this unit while each model in this unit is contesting an objective you control.

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Saurus Oldblood on Carnosaur
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Order, Seraphon, Saurus

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Carnosaur’s Massive Jaws** is 2.

abilities.name: Frenzied by Blood
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit’s **Companion** weapons while it is within 6" of any damaged enemy units or while it is within 6" of any enemy units that had any models slain in the same turn.

abilities.name: Thunderous Roar
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Alpha Predator
abilities.effect: Friendly **Aggradon Lancers** do not lose **rage tokens** at the end of the turn while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Skink Oracle on Troglodon
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Wizard(1), Order, Seraphon, Skink

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Troglodon’s Jaws** is 2.

abilities.name: Terror
abilities.effect: Subtract 2 from the control scores of enemy units while they are in combat with this unit.

abilities.name: Noxious Roar
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units in combat with this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each target. On a 3+, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Troglodon Regeneration
abilities.effect: **Heal (D3)** this unit.

warscrolls.name: Skink Starpriest
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Order, Seraphon, Skink

abilities.name: Serpent Staff
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly **SERAPHON** unit wholly within 18" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, the target’s melee weapons have **Crit (Auto-wound)** until the start of your next turn.

warscrolls.name: Skink Starseer
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (2), Infantry, Fly, Order, Seraphon, Skink

abilities.name: Scry the Stars
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the current battle round number. For each 3+, pick a friendly **SERAPHON** unit wholly within 18" of this unit. That unit has **WARD (5+)** until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Celestial Doom
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Ward rolls cannot be made for the target for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Skinks
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Order, Seraphon, Skink

abilities.name: Swift and Nimble
abilities.effect: When this unit uses the ‘Redeploy’ command, when determining the distance this unit can move, you can roll 2 dice instead of 1 and pick either result.

warscrolls.name: Slann Starmaster
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Hero, Wizard (3), Infantry, Fly, Ward (6+), Order, Seraphon, Slann

abilities.name: Celestial Reinforcements
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SERAPHON** unit that started the battle with 3 or more models and that has been destroyed to be the target.
abilities.effect: Set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Celestial Equilibrium
abilities.declare: Make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to casting rolls made for other friendly **SERAPHON WIZARDS** while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Arcane Vassal
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Any Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SKINK WIZARD** wholly within 18" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Measure the range and visibility of the next **SPELL** ability used by this unit this phase from the target instead of from this unit.

The target is treated as the caster for the purpose of other abilities or spell effects, such as ‘Unbind’ or ‘The Earth Trembles’.

abilities.name: Masters of Order
abilities.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for this unit. In addition, this unit can use an **UNBIND** ability if an enemy **WIZARD** anywhere on the battlefield uses a **SPELL** ability instead of an enemy **WIZARD** within 30" of this unit, and when using the ‘Banish Manifestation’ ability, this unit can pick a manifestation anywhere on the battlefield instead of within 30" of it.

warscrolls.name: Spawn of Chotec
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Beast, Order, Seraphon, Skink

abilities.name: Sun Acolytes
abilities.effect:
This unit has a crew of 3 **Sun Acolytes** that are tokens.

Add 1 to this unit’s control score for each **Sun Acolyte** it has. If this unit has no **Sun Acolytes**, it has a maximum control score of 1 for the rest of the battle.

Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 1 for this unit, remove 1 of its **Sun Acolytes** from the battlefield after the **ATTACK** ability has been resolved (the damage point is still inflicted).

abilities.name: Acid-fuelled Flame
abilities.effect:
Each time this unit uses a **SHOOT** ability, you must pick either its **Glob of Flame Acid** or its **Stream of Fire** ranged weapon.

In addition, after resolving shooting attacks made with this unit’s **Glob of Flame Acid**, if any damage points were allocated to an enemy unit by those attacks, subtract 1 from save rolls for that enemy unit for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Stegadon
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Order, Seraphon, Skink

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Stegadon’s Horns and Jaws** is 4.

abilities.name: Unstoppable Stampede
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy **INFANTRY** unit in combat with it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. Then, this unit can move 2D6". This unit can pass through models in the target unit but must end that move in combat.

warscrolls.name: Stegadon Chief
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Order, Seraphon, Skink

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Stegadon’s Horns and Jaws** is 4.

abilities.name: Skink Coordination
abilities.effect: If a friendly non-**MONSTER SKINK** unit uses the ‘Redeploy’ command while it is wholly within 18" of this unit, no command points are spent.

abilities.name: Crushing Stomps
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. Add 2 to the amount of mortal damage inflicted, if any, if this unit charged this turn.

warscrolls.name: Sunblood Pack
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Order, Seraphon, Saurus

abilities.name: Scaled Protectors
abilities.effect: Ignore negative and positive modifiers to save rolls for this unit.

abilities.name: Starspawned
abilities.effect: Ignore the first damage point that would be allocated to friendly **SAURUS** and **KROXIGOR** units each phase while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Venomite Swarm
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: If this unit’s **Venomites** token is on the battlefield, roll a D3. On a 1, remove this unit’s **Venomites** token from the battlefield. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Terradon Chief
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Cavalry, Fly, Order, Seraphon, Skink

abilities.name: Attack from on High
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for shooting attacks that target this unit.

abilities.name: Chief's Deadly Cargo
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that this unit passed across this phase to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice and add 2 to the roll if this unit is within the combat ranges of any friendly **Terradon Riders** units. On a 5+:

• Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target.
• If any damage points are allocated by this ability and the target does not have **FLY**, the target cannot use **RUN** abilities until the start of your next turn.

warscrolls.name: Terradon Riders
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Fly, Order, Seraphon, Skink

abilities.name: Attack From on High
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for shooting attacks that target this unit.

abilities.name: Deadly Cargo
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that this unit passed across this phase to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice for each model in this unit, and add 2 to each roll if this unit is within the combat ranges of any friendly **Terradon Chief** units. For each 5+:

• Inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.
• If any damage points are allocated by this ability and the target does not have **FLY**, the target cannot use **RUN** abilities until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Dispersed Formation
abilities.effect: This unit has a coherency range of 2".

warscrolls.name: Terrawings
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Beast, Fly, Order, Seraphon

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: Nerve-shredding Screeches
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 10" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. If the roll exceeds the target’s Control characteristic, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: The Jaws of Itzl
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Order, Seraphon, Saurus

abilities.name: Scaled Protectors
abilities.effect: While this unit’s **Kro-Jax** is on the battlefield, ignore the first damage point that would be allocated to this unit in each phase.

abilities.name: Venomite Swarm
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: This unit’s **Sotek’s Venomites** is a token. If this unit’s **Sotek’s Venomites** is on the battlefield, roll a D3. On a 1, remove this unit’s **Sotek’s** **Venomites** from the battlefield. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: The Starblood Stalkers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Order, Seraphon, Skink, Saurus

abilities.name: Otapatl's Dartpipe
abilities.declare: If this unit’s **Otapatl** is on the battlefield, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Klaq-Trok
abilities.effect: While this unit’s **Klaq-Trok** is on the battlefield, ignore the first damage point that would be allocated to this unit each phase.

abilities.name: Kixi-Taka the Diviner
abilities.effect: While this unit’s **Kixi-Taka, the Diviner**, is on the battlefield, it has **WIZARD (1)**.

rules.name: Scaly Monstrosities
rules.effect: Add 2 to the Health characteristic of friendly **SERAPHON MONSTER** units.

rules.name: Nimble and Quick
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase
rules.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **SKINK INFANTRY** or **SKINK CAVALRY** units that are not in combat to be the targets.
rules.effect: Each target can move D6". Each target cannot move into combat during any part of that move.

rules.name: Celestial Translocation
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
rules.declare: Pick a friendly **SERAPHON** unit wholly within 12" of a friendly **SERAPHON WIZARD** to use this ability.
rules.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, remove that unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

rules.name: Vengeance of Azyr
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
rules.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **SAURUS** or **KROXIGOR** units that are in combat to be the targets.
rules.effect:
For each target:

• Make a pile-in move.

• Then, pick an enemy unit in combat with the target and roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that enemy unit equal to the roll.

spells.name: Light of Chotec
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **SERAPHON WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **SERAPHON** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the number of damage points the target has. For each 4+, **Heal (1)** the target.

spells.name: Empowered Celestite
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **SERAPHON WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **SAURUS** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

spells.name: The Earth Trembles
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **SERAPHON WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a point on the battlefield within 18" of them to be the target point, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Draw a straight line between the target point and the closest part on the caster’s base. Roll a D3 for each unit (friendly and enemy) that has models passed across by this line. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.

spells.name: Mystical Unforging
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **SERAPHON WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of the target’s weapons until the start of your next turn.

spells.name: Speed of Huanchi
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **SERAPHON WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **SERAPHON** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Until the start of your next turn, the target can use a **RUN** ability and still use **SHOOT** and/or **CHARGE** abilities later in the turn.

spells.name: Comet's Call
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **SERAPHON WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Roll a dice for each model in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

artefacts.name: Bloodrage Pendant
artefacts.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons. Add 2 instead if the number of damage points allocated to this unit is equal to or greater than half of this unit’s Health characteristic (rounding up).

artefacts.name: Coatl Familiar
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Reaction: You declared a SPELL ability for a friendly SERAPHON WIZARD within this unit’s combat range
artefacts.effect: Add D6 to the casting roll for that spell.

heroicTraits.name: Child of the Stars
heroicTraits.effect: If this unit would be destroyed, before removing it from play, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit is not destroyed and any remaining damage points inflicted on it have no effect. Then, **Heal (D3)** this unit. This unit cannot use this ability again for the rest of the battle.

heroicTraits.name: Chosen of Quetzl
heroicTraits.declare: Pick a visible friendly non-**MONSTER SKINK** unit that is in combat and is wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target can move up to 8". It can move through the combat ranges of enemy units but cannot end that move in combat.

heroicTraits.name: Keeper of the Old Ways
heroicTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Reaction: You declared the ‘Further the Great Plan’ ability
heroicTraits.effect: You can pick 2 different **ASTERISM** abilities instead of 1. They are both used in addition to the one you picked in the deployment phase.

heroicTraits.name: Being of the Stars
heroicTraits.effect: Ignore modifiers to save rolls for this unit (positive and negative).

heroicTraits.name: Beastmaster
heroicTraits.effect: Add 2" to the Move characteristic of friendly **SERAPHON CAVALRY** and **SERAPHON MONSTER** units for the rest of the phase if they are wholly within 12" of this unit at the start of the move.

heroicTraits.name: Reptilian Cunning
heroicTraits.effect: If this unit charged this turn, if a friendly unit wholly within 12" of this unit uses the ‘All-out Attack’ command in the combat phase, no command points are spent.

other.name: Armour Cruncher
other.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
other.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll equals or exceeds the target’s Save characteristic, subtract 1 from save rolls for the target for the rest of the turn.

other.name: Ancient Defender
other.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by this unit’s **Companion** weapons.

other.name: Titan of the Land
other.effect: This unit counts as a terrain piece for the purpose of picking targets for the friendly **Realmshaper Engine**’s ‘Power Unleashed’ ability. Do not inflict any mortal damage on this unit as part of that ability.

battleTraits.name: Quetzl the Preserver
battleTraits.effect: Subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of melee weapons for attacks that target friendly **SERAPHON** units that are wholly within friendly territory.

battleTraits.name: Sotek the Deliverer
battleTraits.effect: Add 2 to the Move characteristic of friendly **SERAPHON** units.

battleTraits.name: Itzl the Tamer
battleTraits.effect: **Companion** weapons used by friendly **SERAPHON** units have **Crit (2 Hits)**.

battleTraits.name: The Great Plan
battleTraits.effect: That **ASTERISM** ability can be used for the rest of the battle, but the others cannot, unless allowed by the ‘Further the Great Plan’ ability.

battleTraits.name: Further the Great Plan
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Start of the Third Battle Round
battleTraits.declare:
You can use this ability if you meet the condition below that corresponds to the **ASTERISM** you picked in the deployment phase.

***Itzl the Tamer:*** 3 or more enemy units have been destroyed.

***Quetzl the Preserver:*** There are no enemy units wholly within friendly territory.

***Sotek the Deliverer:*** The enemy general is in combat or has been destroyed.

***Tepok the Seer:*** There are any friendly **SLANN** units on the battlefield and no friendly **SLANN** units are in combat or have been destroyed.
battleTraits.effect: Pick a different **ASTERISM** ability. It can be used in addition to the one you picked in the deployment phase.

battleTraits.name: Tepok the Seer
battleTraits.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for friendly **SERAPHON** units.
